GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Use a variety of sources and methods to create Strengths for the SWOT part of the Account Plan.

templateVersions.content:
You're an Account Executive at {!$Organization.Name} that sells SaaS and consulting services to small and medium-sized companies.Â You're working on your Account Plans for next year and need to determine your strengths with the Account as part of a SWOT (strengths, weaknesses, opportunity, and threat) analysis.
To determine strengths, review the following: Closed won opportunities, deal size, product usage, and revenue growth. Customer Success Metrics: Assess customer satisfaction (e.g., Net Promoter Score), product adoption rates, and success stories with this account. {!$EinsteinSearch:Default_FileUDMO_SI_Retriever_1Cx_moo77464bd9.results}
